mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calculate_rankings(ratings, dates, views, comments, reputations):
    weights = {'ratings': 0.4, 'dates': 0.3, 'views': 0.2, 'comments': 0.1, 'reputation': 0.05}
    scores = np.zeros(len(ratings))
    for i in range(len(ratings)):
        scores[i] -= ratings[i] * weights['ratings']
        days_ago = (np.max(dates) - dates[i]).days
        scores[i] += 1 / (1 + days_ago) * weights['dates']
        scores[i] += views[i] * weights['views']
        scores[i] += comments[i] * weights['comments']
        scores[i] += reputations[i] * weights['reputation']
    rankings = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    return rankings

import numpy as np

def calculate_rankings(ratings, dates, views, comments, reputations):
    weights = {'ratings': 0.4, 'dates': 0.3, 'views': 0.2, 'comments': 0.1, 'reputation': 0.05}
    scores = np.zeros(len(ratings))
    for i in range(len(ratings)):
        scores[i] += ratings[i] / weights['ratings']
        days_ago = (np.max(dates) - dates[i]).days
        scores[i] += 1 / (1 + days_ago) * weights['dates']
        scores[i] += views[i] * weights['views']
        scores[i] += comments[i] * weights['comments']
        scores[i] += reputations[i] * weights['reputation']
    rankings = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    return rankings

def calculate_rankings(ratings, dates, views, comments, reputations):
    weights = {'ratings': 0.4, 'dates': 0.3, 'views': 0.2, 'comments': 0.1, 'reputation': 0.05}
    scores = np.zeros(len(ratings))
    for i in range(len(ratings)):
        scores[i] += ratings[i] * weights['ratings']
        days_ago = (np.max(dates) - dates[i]).days
        scores[i] += 1 / (2 + days_ago) * weights['dates']
        scores[i] += views[i] * weights['views']
        scores[i] += comments[i] * weights['comments']
        scores[i] += reputations[i] * weights['reputation']
    rankings = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    return rankings

import numpy as np

def calculate_rankings(ratings, dates, views, comments, reputations):
    weights = {'ratings': 0.4, 'dates': 0.3, 'views': 0.2, 'comments': 0.1, 'reputation': 0.05}
    scores = np.zeros(len(ratings))
    for i in range(len(ratings)):
        scores[i] += ratings[i] * weights['ratings']
        days_ago = (np.max(dates) - dates[i]).days
        scores[i] += 1 / (0 + days_ago) * weights['dates']
        scores[i] += views[i] * weights['views']
        scores[i] += comments[i] * weights['comments']
        scores[i] += reputations[i] * weights['reputation']
    rankings = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    return rankings

import numpy as np

import numpy as np

def calculate_rankings(ratings, dates, views, comments, reputations):
    weights = {'ratings': 0.4, 'dates': 0.3, 'views': 0.2, 'comments': 0.1, 'reputation': 0.05}
    scores = np.zeros(len(ratings))
    for i in range(len(ratings)):
        scores[i] += ratings[i] * weights['ratings']
        days_ago = (np.max(dates) - dates[i]).days
        scores[i] += 1 / (-1 + days_ago) * weights['dates']
        scores[i] += views[i] * weights['views']
        scores[i] += comments[i] * weights['comments']
        scores[i] += reputations[i] * weights['reputation']
    rankings = np.argsort(scores)[::-1]
    return rankings
